code: import{atom,selector}from"recoil";import{recoilPersist}from"recoil-persist";var _recoilPersist=recoilPersist({key:"recoil-persist",storage:localStorage}),persistAtom=_recoilPersist.persistAtom;export var Categories;(function(Categories){Categories["TO_DO"]="TO_DO";Categories["DOING"]="DOING";Categories["DONE"]="DONE";})(Categories||(Categories={}));export var categoryState=atom({key:"category",default:Categories.TO_DO});export var toDoState=atom({key:"toDo",default:[],effects_UNSTABLE:[persistAtom]});export var toDoSelector=selector({key:"toDoSelector",get:function get(_ref){var _get=_ref.get;var toDos=_get(toDoState);var category=_get(categoryState);return toDos.filter(function(toDo){return toDo.category===category;});}});
